title: Email/Password Login Success
description: Verify that a user can successfully log in using valid email and password credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter valid email and correct password.
Click the login button.
User should be redirected to the dashboard page.
User session should be established and accessible.

title: Email/Password Login Failure
description: Verify the login fails with incorrect email or password and appropriate error message is shown.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter invalid email or incorrect password.
Click the login button.
The login should fail.
An error message indicating invalid credentials should be displayed.

title: Google OAuth Login Success
description: Verify that a user can successfully log in using the Google OAuth option.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Click on the Google OAuth login button.
Complete Google authentication flow with valid Google account.
User is redirected to the dashboard page.
User session is correctly established with linked Google account.

title: Password Reset Flow
description: Verify that the password reset process works correctly from request to completion.

steps.description: Navigate to the forgot password page.
Submit a valid registered email address.
A password reset email is sent to the user.
Follow the reset link and provide a new valid password.
Submit the new password.
User can log in successfully with the new password.

title: Password Strength Indicator
description: Validate that the password strength indicator reflects the entered password strength correctly during signup and password reset.

steps.description: Navigate to signup or password reset page.
Input various passwords ranging from weak to strong.
Password strength indicator updates dynamically showing correct strength levels.

title: Practice Mode Topic Selection and Configuration
description: Ensure practice mode displays all topics correctly and allows configuration of question count, difficulty, and timer.

steps.description: Navigate to practice mode from dashboard or homepage.
All available topics are listed and selectable.
Select a topic.
Configure number of questions, difficulty level, and time limit.
Settings are applied and reflected correctly on interface.

title: Practice Mode Real-time Feedback and Scoring
description: Verify that users receive immediate feedback on answers and final practice summary shows accurate scoring and stats.

steps.description: Start a practice session with configured settings.
Answer questions sequentially.
Each answer submission gives immediate correct/incorrect feedback.
Complete the entire practice session.
Practice summary shows correct number of attempted, correct, wrong answers and detailed breakdown.

title: Test Mode Configuration and Start
description: Test that users can select and configure test types (mixed, PYQs, custom), review instructions, and start test with system checks.

steps.description: Navigate to test mode.
Select a test type such as Mixed or PYQs.
Configure test parameters (number of questions, difficulty, timer if applicable).
Review instruction screen and ensure mandatory system checks pass.
Start the timed test.
Test starts successfully in full-screen mode with all interface components loaded.

title: Test-Taking Interface Functionality
description: Validate the test interface including question navigation, marking for review, saving answers, auto-save, and countdown timer with warnings.

steps.description: During an active test, navigate between questions using question palette and navigation buttons.
Mark certain questions for review and unmark them.
Save answers manually and check that auto-save triggers periodically.
Answers are saved accurately and persist on navigation or page reload.
Countdown timer displays time left and shows warnings when 5 minutes remain.

title: Test Submission and Confirmation Flow
description: Verify the test submission flow including confirmation dialog and redirection to results page on successful submission.

steps.description: Submit the test using the submit button.
A confirmation prompt is displayed to confirm test submission.
Confirm submission.
Test is submitted and results are saved in backend.
User is redirected to the test results dashboard with analytics.

title: Test Results and Analytics Accuracy
description: Ensure that the test results page shows accurate score breakdown, charts, AI insights, solution review, and allows PDF report download.

steps.description: Access the test results page after test submission.
Scores and subcategory wise performance are displayed correctly.
Performance charts and comparison metrics are rendered.
AI insights and personalized suggestions are shown.
Review detailed solutions with filtering options.
Download the PDF report successfully.

title: Student Dashboard Displays Correct Data
description: Verify the student dashboard shows accurate recent activities, statistics cards, performance trends charts, and AI recommendations.

steps.description: Navigate to the student dashboard after login.
Recent activities reflect latest tests and practice sessions accurately.
Statistics cards display correct metrics like total tests taken, average score, etc.
Performance trends charts are rendered with correct historical data.
AI-driven recommendations are appropriate and visible.

title: User Profile Update and Dark Mode Toggle
description: Test that user profile fields are editable and saved correctly, and that dark mode toggle persists preferences across sessions.

steps.description: Navigate to the user profile management page.
Edit profile fields such as name, email, preferences and save changes.
Changes are saved and reflected after page reload.
Toggle dark mode on and off.
Dark mode state persists after user logout and new login.

title: Admin Panel CRUD for Categories
description: Verify that admins can create, read, update, and delete categories via the admin panel interface.

steps.description: Login as admin and navigate to categories management page.
Create a new category with valid details.
New category appears in the list with correct details.
Edit the created category and update details.
Updated details are saved and displayed correctly.
Delete the category.
Category is removed from the list and database.

title: Admin Panel CRUD for Tests and Questions
description: Verify that the admin can manage tests and questions fully with create, update, delete operations from the admin panel.

steps.description: Navigate to the tests management page in admin panel.
Create a new test with valid parameters.
New test is visible and accurate.
Edit existing test details.
Edits are reflected after save.
Delete a test and confirm.
Test no longer appears in the list.
Navigate to questions management page.
Create, edit, and delete questions linked to tests.
Changes are consistent and reflected in practice and test mode.

title: Adaptive Practice AI Difficulty Adjustment and Mastery Tracking
description: Ensure the adaptive practice system adjusts question difficulty based on user's performance and tracks mastery accurately.

steps.description: Start an adaptive practice session for a category.
Answer initial questions correctly and observe adaptive difficulty increase.
Answer some questions incorrectly and observe difficulty adjustment.
Question difficulty changes dynamically based on performance.
Mastery level is updated correctly and visible in the practice summary.

title: Global and Segmented Leaderboards Display
description: Verify that leaderboards show correct user rankings, badges, and progress for global, weekly, monthly, and test-specific views.

steps.description: Navigate to the leaderboards page.
Global leaderboard displays users ranked correctly by total points or tests.
Switch to weekly, monthly, and test-specific leaderboards.
Leaderboards update accordingly with correct ranks and badges.

title: Responsive and Accessibility Compliance
description: Check that the application UI is responsive on desktop, tablet, and mobile, and meets accessibility standards (ARIA, keyboard navigation, color contrast).

steps.description: Access the platform using different devices and screen sizes.
UI components adjust layout and sizing appropriately.
Navigate the app using keyboard only.
All interactive elements are reachable and usable via keyboard.
Verify ARIA labels and roles are present and correct.
Colors meet WCAG contrast standards.

title: SEO Metadata and Structured Data Verification
description: Validate that pages have correct SEO metadata, structured JSON-LD data, canonical URLs, sitemap and robots.txt are generated properly.

steps.description: Inspect page sources for presence of metadata tags (title, description, keywords).
Structured data in JSON-LD format is present and valid.
Verify canonical URLs are set to the preferred page URLs.
Check sitemap.xml and robots.txt files are accessible and contain appropriate entries.

title: API Route Authentication and Error Handling
description: Ensure all API routes related to test operations and practice sessions are secured, require authentication, and properly handle error states.

steps.description: Attempt to call test and practice API routes without authentication.
API returns unauthorized error response.
Call API routes with valid authentication but invalid or missing parameters.
API responds with appropriate error codes and descriptive messages.
Call API with valid parameters and authentication.
API successfully processes request and returns correct data.

title: Progressive Web App Offline Support and Install Prompt
description: Verify the app functions offline with cached content and triggers install prompt for supported browsers.

steps.description: Load the application and cache pages and assets.
Disconnect from the internet.
Navigate the app pages that were previously accessed.
Cached pages load successfully without errors.
Observe that the install prompt is displayed on supported browsers.
